model Person {
    fields {
        identity Identity
    }
    operations {
        create createPerson() {
            @set(
                person.identity 
                = 
                ctx.identity
            )
        }
    }
}

===

model Person {
    fields {
        identity Identity
    }

    operations {
        create createPerson() {
            @set(person.identity = ctx.identity)
        }
    }
}
